name: Intoxication Station (Beta Build)
description:
This is a small project I've been working on with the incomparable Stacey (aka Game.Set.Satch) in our free time over the last month or so.
---
Get drunk.
Ride trains.
BREAK THE LAW!!
---
(Feedback is HIGHLY encouraged Give us your thoughts! What did you like? Dislike?
What do you think could make this game more fun? Exciting? Engaging?)

**This is an in-progress build. It is also helpful to note any bugs experienced in play (graphical, mechanical, performance, etc.) that got in the way of your immersion**

**It is recommended that you play in full-screen, as an expected bug causes the aspect ratio to change and zoom in.**
